Posts.EditableText: I realize this game is old, and this has been asked before without success, but what does one do in operation sleepover once their character has been mad a 2-year old? I've gotten to the point where I found the watch and made the screwdriver, but then I killed myself on the electrical outlet. Am I missing something, or is this game just a poorly disguised message not to harass your sister? Thanks, Garberdog
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Use the screwdriver on the vent, not the outlet. 
Let me know what you do after you made the cookies, cause I'm stuck there...
